poster: I A m D r e w w
title: Rengar Patch 6.2
body:
Can someone explain why the damage on ferocity was changed from 50% to 30%
i understand he was getting nerfed but now the ferocity q is almost as strong as a normal q
couldn't they of changed something else

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is mainly for help and support regarding technical issues with the game, your thread would be better suited for the[ Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) board.
